title: to people who only/mostly play ranked games: How many times have you seen camille?
body: for me, maybe 3 times, 5 times tops since her release. Kind of tragic if you ask me..

replies.body: I've seen her maybe 4 times since her release. All 4 times she loses because shes vs me usually as {{champion:122}} . I have no trouble taking her down at all
rarely. it's a perma ban thing. and the few games she does make it, she always win hard. regardless if jungler helps against her.
She's always banned in my games.
She's always banned, and then some moron who thinks she's broken beyond any kind of rationale plays her that one game she isn't, and feeds. I just hope she's on the enemy team unless I'm playing her.
Twice? Maybe? Wish I could say the same for ww, cause he is a garbo champ and people are first timing him in ranked.
I've seen her like three or four times since her release probably, because of permaban, and pretty much every time she gets fed and then throws the game by trying to 1 vs 5 repeatedly.
I've never had firsthand experience against her top, but every time the enemies pick her, my top laner manages to get solo killed 3 times in 5 minutes. It's safer for me to just ban her lmao
I haven't played ranked recently, but when I did she was banned 90+% of the time
She doesn't get banned in my games and I still don't see her. Not even once.
